name: vs-recorder
effect: Optionally records wireless, Wi-Fi, and Battle Frontier battles. Tracks Battle Points earned in the Battle Frontier, and stores commemorative prints.
short_effect: Records wireless, Wi-Fi, or Battle Frontier battles, and stores points.

flavor_text.platinum: An amazing device that can record a battle either between friends or at a special battle facility.
